verses.name: Psalms 10:1
verses.text: Why standest thou afar off, O Lord? why hidest thou thyself in times of trouble?

verses.name: Psalms 10:2
verses.text: The wicked in his pride doth persecute the poor: let them be taken in the devices that they have imagined.

verses.name: Psalms 10:3
verses.text: For the wicked boasteth of his heart’s desire, and blesseth the covetous, whom the Lord abhorreth.

verses.name: Psalms 10:4
verses.text: The wicked, through the pride of his countenance, will not seek after God: God is not in all his thoughts.

verses.name: Psalms 10:5
verses.text: His ways are always grievous; thy judgments are far above out of his sight: as for all his enemies, he puffeth at them.
